00047 class CObject {

00050  
00051  object_t m_type;          // yorp, vorticon, etc.
00052  unsigned int m_index;         // Like an ID for some objects that need this implementation
00053  char HealthPoints;                  // episode 1 style four-shots-to-kill
00054  bool exists;

00063  Uint32 bboxY1, bboxY2;

00066  // appear in front of the background

00070

00072 
00073  bool inhibitfall;         // if true common_enemy_ai will not do falling
00074

00076  std::vector<CObject*> *mp_object;
